long_description: The versatile Goal Zero Boulder 15 solar panel gathers 15 watts of power from the sun and provides power for use in an RV, cabin and campsite. Monocrystalline cells collect 15 watts of power. Trickle-charge an Escape 150 power pack in 5 - 6 hrs., a Sherpa 50 power pack in 4 - 8 hrs. or a Boulder power pack in 10 - 20 hrs. (power packs sold separately). Strong, tempered glass and aluminum frame are durable enough for temporary or permanent installation. Multiple Boulder 15 panels can be linked together to maximize power collection and reduce recharging time. The Goal Zero Boulder 15 solar panel features 18 - 20V open-circuit voltage, 17 - 18% converting efficiency and 4.7mm output port with 12V charging power.
short_description: The versatile Goal Zero Boulder 15 solar panel gathers 15 watts of power from the sun and provides power for use in an RV, cabin and campsite.
